extractedData.name: SURIYAKANTH M
extractedData.summary: Passionate and punctual individual with an MCA degree, skilled in Web Development, data analysis, UI/UX design and research, and machine learning. Strong at understanding users, designing easy-to-use interfaces, and analyzing data to find useful insights. Looking for an entry-level role to apply my skills and contribute to meaningful projects.

experience.description: Worked on a project called Media Jungle, an OTT platform. Created wireframes, user flows, and prototypes, and worked closely with the team to design the app and understand what users need to make it easy to use.

projects.name: Online Examination Portal
projects.description: Developed a secure online examination portal with automatic exam submission using the Page Visibility API to prevent tab switching and malpractice.

projects.name: Face Verified Attendance System Using Django
projects.description: Attendance system with barcode scanning and facial recognition for proper student verification. Added Background tasks for automated monitoring.

projects.name: Fostering Emotional Intelligence in Educational Environment
projects.description: Developed a face detection and emotion analysis application using Python, CNN, and Haar cascade to identify emotional states (happy, sad, disgusted, neutral, surprised, angry).
achievements: Received Best Paper Award at the conference for innovative research applications

projects.name: Emotion Guided Attendance System
projects.description: Extended the face detection and emotion analysis application to identify students and record their attendance based on their facial emotional state.
